formatted_address: Educity, 81550 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Educity Sports Complex

reviews.text: Booking running track at night but no light at all very dark.. they said i only paid 5rgt why they shld open the light?â€¦ such a worst service given.. its not abt how much money i paid but the service and the answer i get very dissapoint.. management pls improve ur service and your people attitude..

Good environment and clean water swimming pool.
But I feel expensive on the public adult entry fees keep increase from RM10 ->RM15 to RM20 nowadays. The toilet maintenance needs to be improved. Most of the locker numbering locks are damaged. Should repair and maintain well for visitors use.
A good place for sports event. Space is huge. Parking is plenty

Huge sports complex within an education township. Theres Southampton University, Reading University and Sekolah Kebangsaan Medini within walking distance.

Sports complex has aquatic center with 2 swimming pools. 25m and 50m competition pool. Indoor arena, track and field, futsal, basketball and a small playground. Parking is plenty and loads of shops nearby.

Great venue. Attended a rock concert at the adjacent Indoor Arena. There were people playing football at the venue next door at midnight! Ample parking spaces. There were also a night market at the venue to coincide with the gig. Located around 15minutes from the 2nd Link.
